name: Do No Harm (Mason B.)
description:
Do No Harm

(But Take No S**T)

This is the second game in my 8 games-8 weeks development marathon. This is probably one of my favorite jam games I've ever made, thoroughly enjoyed it, I hope you all do to!

Premise:

There are people who have 'wronged' you in the neighborhood. Time to get some payback by wrecking their houses when they aren't home. Wreck and destroy as much as possible, all without being caught!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact/Wreck

Q  - Throw Egg

Space - Jump

Interactables: Threats/Avoid:

Cameras - scan an area and alert the owner if there is someone nearby

Drones - fly around and set off an alarm if they spot someone

Locked Gates - Can be picked with some quick fingers

Destructables:

Throw your eggs! - press Q to throw eggs at almost any object to cause some extra chaos

Gardens - Stomp on flowerbeds to ruin the crops

Paths - dishevel the hard laid pathways

Structures/items - throw pots, urns, vases, statues, food baskets, and more!

CC Music Used:

All Music by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/
